original: 漢嘉郡旄牛夷首領之子，狼路叔父。奉狼路之命，相度形勢，以決定是否攻打張嶷。張嶷以酒食犒勞狼離及其部眾，又送還其姐，狼離因而歸心。
text: Son of the leader of Hanjia County Yanniuyi, Uncle Langlu. By the order of Langlu, we will compare the situation to decide whether to attack Zhang Yi. Zhang Yi rewarded Langli and his tribe with wine and food, and returned his sister to Langli.
